import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Box, AppBar, Toolbar, Typography, Button, Menu, MenuItem, Grid, Card, CardContent, Drawer, IconButton, Avatar, Divider, Badge } from "@mui/material"; import ShoppingCartIcon from "@mui/icons-material/ShoppingCart"; import AccountCircleIcon from "@mui/icons-material/AccountCircle"; import HomeIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Home"; import MoreVertIcon from "@mui/icons-material/MoreVert"; import WalletIcon from "@mui/icons-material/AccountBalanceWallet"; import ListAltIcon from "@mui/icons-material/ListAlt"; const brandRed = "#e23744"; // Zomato red const brandDark = "#241c1c"; const cardBg = "#fff"; const cardRadius = 16; export default function UserDashboard() { const [drawerOpen, setDrawerOpen] = useState(false); // Optionally, you could manage menus for nav dropdowns return ( {/* AppBar/Navbar */} FUELnow {/* Profile Drawer */} setDrawerOpen(false)}> jai devarajan {/* MAIN GRID */} {/* Available Loyalty */} Status Active ₹ 0 Available Loyalty - Blocked (In Cart, Payment Initiated) {/* Wallet Limit */} Status Active ₹ 0 Amount available in your wallet {/* Last 5 Orders */} My Last 5 Orders No records found {/* My Assets */} My Assets No records found {/* Footer */} Home | About Us | Contact Us | Privacy Policy | Legal Notice | Cancellation and Refund Policy | Interested in Services | Become a Partner
© 2025 Reliance BP Mobility Limited. All rights reserved. ); }
